name: Dice or Die (DumbCow)
description:
• Dice or Die

-  Dice or Die was made for the GMTK Game Jam using Unity Engine and some cans of energy drink

- The Idea: Randomness Manipulator

- Recommended to download for better performance

  • Features

- Dice interaction via kicking (running into the dice)

- Dice customizing system + Inventory

- Special Abilities

  • How to play

- Movement: W A S D

- Jump: Space

- Inventory: Escape

- Sprint: Shift

  • Credits

- Code: @DumbCow, @YuuHitori, @Leminhquan

- Modeling, Animation: @DumbCow

- Presentation: @YuuHitori, @Leminhquan

- Honorable mention: Binhvcl

- Free assets from Unity

- We didn't have time for audio :v
